## Loading packages

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
packages <- c("terra", "beepr", "tictoc", "viridis")
walk(packages, require, character.only = T)

```

```{r}

habitat_predictions <- read_csv("Python/outputs/id2005_habitat_suitability_landscape_subset.csv")
head(habitat_predictions)

# lengthen data frame
habitat_predictions_long <- habitat_predictions %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = !Landscape_Predictions, names_to = "Covariate", values_to = "Values")

head(habitat_predictions_long)

```

## Plot the covariate vs prediction values

```{r}

habitat_predictions_long %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Values, y = Landscape_Predictions, color = Covariate)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  labs(title = "Habitat predictions vs covariates",
       x = "Covariate values",
       y = "Habitat predictions")

```
